text: So once again the metaphysics were depressing, and in absolute contrast to the physical display. Mos have an un-American love of parades, and these young ones, on parade for jobs which they had to get to pay off their college bills, were naturally putting their best foot forward.
handwritten_text: So once again the metaphysics were depressing, and in absolute contrast to the physical display. Mos have an un-American love of parades, and these young ones, on parade for jobs which they had to get to pay off their college bills, were naturally putting their best foot forward.
